text: The Bear and the Doll () is a 1970 French romantic comedy movie directed by Michel Deville and starring Brigitte Bardot, Jean-Pierre Cassel, Daniel Ceccaldi, Julien Verdier, Sabine Haudepin. It was distributed by Paramount Pictures. ==Other websites== * * * The Bear and the Doll at Premiere France Category:1970 romantic comedy movies Category:French romance movies Category:French comedy movies Category:Paramount Pictures movies Category:Movies directed by Michel Deville
title: The Bear and the Doll
